body:
Changes in upstream are an issue even without this that I'd like to figure out a fix for eventually anyways.

We run `./mach lint` using recent versions of mozilla-central as a part of our Taskcluster builds on every commit and PR, so if anyone changes the mozilla/recommended rules, we should pick up on those pretty quick. Hopefully that will be enough.
